snippet: Robert M. Morgenthau, the former Manhattan district attorney, responds to an editorial.
abstract: Letter from former Manhattan District Attorney Robert M Morgenthau comments on Nov 27 editorial criticizing Pres Obama's passivity on the issue of immigration.
lead_paragraph: Robert M. Morgenthau, the former Manhattan district attorney, responds to an editorial.

headline.main: A Plea to Carry Out a Principled Immigration Policy
headline.print_headline: A Plea to Carry Out a Principled Immigration Policy
